Dialogs.Text: MsMaki95: Mmm? o-o Why? Well, i never saw you before.
SecurPink1850: Of course, this is a new avatar.
>No one writes anything for a couple of seconds.
MsMaki95: You are clearly new. n-n
MsMaki95: You can only have one avatar by mail and IP. n-n And because of a glitch, you can't change your name. u-u
MsMaki95: The only one who would take that much time to do that is one person. Password? o-o
MsMaki95: Yeah, you are not him. n-n But you sound a bit like him, hehehe. >-o
Thomas B: I sound like who...? Well, with this i know there is more people here. And, she doesn't sound like an AI for a place as old as this.
MsMaki95: Oh! Speaking of new... o-o
